molecular.statistics.time_series¶

Description

time_series.py

author: C. Lockhart <chris@lockhartlab.org> language: Python3

Functions

acorr(a)

Compute the lagged autocorrelation of an observation \(a\).

acov(a[, fft])

Compute the unbiased auto-covariance function \(\gamma(k)\) from dataset \(a\) with \(N\) samples for lag-time \(k\).

inefficiency(a)

Compute the statistical inefficiency \(g\) from the equilibration time au_{eq}.

sem_tcorr(a[, tol])

Estimate of standard error of the mean derived from the correlation time.

tcorr(a)

Compute equilibration time \(\tau_{corr}\) based on the autocorrelation function \(\rho(t)\).
